entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.0°C

Humidity: 69 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21.
